web.secrets.passphraseComplexityRequired.en: Must include uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol
web.secrets.passphraseComplexityRequired.translation: Me whai i ngā pūmatua, pūiti, tau, me te tohu

web.secrets.theyll_appear_here_once_youv.en: They'll appear here once you've shared them.
web.secrets.theyll_appear_here_once_youv.translation: Ka puta mai ki konei i te wā kua tuaritia e koe.

web.secrets.recipient_delivery_is_option.translation: He kōwhiringa te tuku ki te kaiwhiwhi

web.secrets.workspace_mode_description.en: Create multiple secrets without leaving this page

web.secrets.sample_secret_content_this_c.en: Sample secret content This could be sensitive data Or a multi-line message
web.secrets.sample_secret_content_this_c.translation: Tauira ihirangi karere huna Ka taea tēnei te raraunga tairongo Ko tētahi karere maha-rārangi rānei

web.secrets.secret_content_copied_to_cli.translation: Kua tāruatia te ihirangi karere huna ki te papatopenga

web.secrets.secret_value_not_available.translation: Kāore e wātea te uara karere huna

web.secrets.you_can_safely_close_this_ta.en: You can close this window when done.
web.secrets.you_can_safely_close_this_ta.translation: Ka taea e koe te kati i tēnei matapihi ina oti.

web.secrets.enter_the_secret_content_her.translation: Tāurua te ihirangi karere huna ki konei

web.secrets.enter_the_secret_content_to_.en: Enter the secret content to share here
web.secrets.enter_the_secret_content_to_.translation: Tāurua te ihirangi karere huna hei tuari ki konei

web.secrets.when_ready_click_the_view_se.en: When ready, click the button at the top of the page to reveal your one-time message.
web.secrets.when_ready_click_the_view_se.translation: Ina reri, pāwhiri te pātene i te tihi o te whārangi hei whakaatu i tō karere kotahi-wā.

web.secrets.what_happens_next.translation: He aha te mea e whai ake nei?

web.secrets.yes_after_viewing_the_secret.en: Yes. After viewing, the secret is permanently deleted from our servers, ensuring your privacy.
web.secrets.yes_after_viewing_the_secret.translation: Āe. Whai muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua pūmautia te karere huna mai i ā mātou tūmau, kia whakaū i tō matatapu.

web.secrets.onetime_secret_is_a_secure_w.en: Onetime Secret is a secure way to share sensitive information that self-destructs after a single viewing.
web.secrets.onetime_secret_is_a_secure_w.translation: Ko Onetime Secret te huarahi haumaru ki te tuari i ngā mōhiohio tairongo e whakangaromia-anō whai muri i te tirohanga kotahi.

web.secrets.before_you_open_it_heres_wha.en: Before you open it, here's what you should know:
web.secrets.before_you_open_it_heres_wha.translation: I mua i tō huaki, anei te mea me mōhio koe:

web.secrets.a_secure_one_time_message_aw.en: A secure, one-time message awaits you.
web.secrets.a_secure_one_time_message_aw.translation: E tatari ana tētahi karere kotahi-wā, haumaru ki a koe.

web.secrets.auto_expire_after_viewing.translation: Aunoa-pau whai muri i te tirohanga

web.secrets.that_information_is_no_longe.en: This secret has been viewed or expired.
web.secrets.that_information_is_no_longe.translation: Kua tirohia, kua pau rānei tēnei karere huna.

web.private.this_msg_is_encrypted.en: This message is encrypted with your passphrase.
web.private.this_msg_is_encrypted.translation: Kua muhumuhua tēnei karere ki tō kupu karapa.

web.private.only_see_once.en: Careful: you will only see this once.
web.private.only_see_once.translation: Kia tūpato: ka kitea tēnei kotahi anake.

web.private.created_success.translation: Kua hangaia angitutia te karere huna!

web.private.created_success_key.translation: Kua hangaia angitutia te karere huna {shortKey}!

web.private.created_securely.en: Your secret has been created securely
web.private.created_securely.translation: Kua hangaia haumaru tō karere huna

web.private.have_more_questions_visit_ou.translation: He pātai anō? Toro ki tā mātou

web.private.the_burn_feature_lets_you_pe.en: The burn feature lets you permanently delete a secret before anyone views it. This is useful if you need to revoke access or shared the wrong information. Once burned, the secret cannot be recovered.
web.private.the_burn_feature_lets_you_pe.translation: Ko te āhuatanga whakawareware ka tuku i a koe ki te muku pūmau i tētahi karere huna i mua i te tirohanga o tētahi. He mea whai hua tēnei mēnā me whakakore te urunga, i tuari rānei i ngā mōhiohio hē. Ina whakawarekia, kāore e taea te whakahoki i te karere huna.

web.private.your_secret_will_remain_avai.en: Your secret will remain available for {0} or until it's viewed, whichever comes first. After either condition is met, the secret is permanently deleted.
web.private.your_secret_will_remain_avai.translation: Ka noho wātea tonu tō karere huna mō {0}, tae noa rānei ki te wā ka tirohia, ko tēhea e tae tuatahi ana. Whai muri i te tutuki o tētahi o ngā āhuatanga, ka mukua pūmautia te karere huna.

web.private.how_does_secret_expiration_w.translation: Me pēhea te mahi o te paunga karere huna?

web.private.for_security_reasons_we_cant.en: For security reasons, we can't recover lost secret links. You'll need to create a new secret and generate a new link. We recommend copying the link immediately after creation.
web.private.for_security_reasons_we_cant.translation: Mō ngā take haumaru, kāore e taea e mātou te whakahoki mai i ngā hononga karere huna ngaro. Me waihanga e koe he karere huna hou, me hanga hoki he hononga hou. Ka tūtohu mātou kia tāruahia te hononga i te wā tonu i muri i te hanganga.

web.private.lost_your_secret_link.translation: Kua ngaro tō hononga karere huna?

web.private.we_display_the_value_for_you.en: We display the value for you so that you can verify it but we do that once so that if someone gets this private page (in your browser history or if you accidentally send the private link instead of the secret one), they won't see the secret value.
web.private.we_display_the_value_for_you.translation: Ka whakaatu mātou i te uara ki a koe kia taea ai e koe te whakaū engari ka mahia kotahi tēnā, nō reira ki te whiwhi tētahi i tēnei whārangi tūmataiti (i tō hītori pūtirotiro, mehemea rānei ka tuku matapokorere koe i te hononga tūmataiti kaua ko te hononga karere huna), kāore rātou e kite i te uara karere huna.

web.private.why_can_i_only_see_the_secre.en: Why can I only see the secret value once?
web.private.why_can_i_only_see_the_secre.translation: He aha ka kitea kotahi noa e au te uara karere huna?

web.private.burning_a_secret_permanently.en: Burning a secret permanently deletes it before anyone can read it. The recipient will see a message indicating the secret doesn't exist. This is useful if you accidentally share the wrong information or need to prevent access.
web.private.burning_a_secret_permanently.translation: Ko te whakawareware i tētahi karere huna ka muku pūmau i mua i te pānuitanga o tētahi. Ka kite te kaiwhiwhi i tētahi karere e tohu ana kāore te karere huna i te tīari. He mea whai hua tēnei mēnā ka tuari pohewa koe i ngā mōhiohio hē, me ārai rānei te urunga.

web.private.what_happens_when_i_burn_a_s.en: What happens when I burn a secret?
web.private.what_happens_when_i_burn_a_s.translation: He aha ka puta ina whakawaretia e au tētahi karere huna?

web.private.and_never_stored_in_its_orig.en: and never stored in its original form. This approach means we can't access or recover your secret - only someone with the correct passphrase can.
web.private.and_never_stored_in_its_orig.translation: ā, kāore i te rokiroki i tōna āhua taketake. Ko tēnei huarahi ko tō tikanga kāore e taea e mātou te uru, te whakahoki rānei i tō karere huna - ko te tangata anake me te kupu karapa tika ka taea.

web.private.each_secret_can_only_be_view.en: Each secret can only be viewed once. After viewing, it's permanently deleted from our servers. This ensures your sensitive information isn't accidentally exposed through browser history or mistakenly shared private links.
web.private.each_secret_can_only_be_view.translation: Ka taea te tiro kotahi noa ia karere huna. Whai muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua pūmautia mai i ā mātou tūmau. Ka whakaū tēnei kāore e kitea pokerehia ō mōhiohio tairongo mā te hītori pūtirotiro, mā ngā hononga tūmataiti hē rānei.

web.shared.requires_passphrase.translation: Me whai kupu karapa tēnei karere:

web.shared.viewed_own_secret.en: You have viewed your own secret. It is no longer available for anyone else.
web.shared.viewed_own_secret.translation: Kua tirohia e koe tō ake karere huna. Kāore i te wātea mō tētahi atu.

web.shared.you_created_this_secret.en: You created this secret. If you view it, the recipient will not be able to see it.
web.shared.you_created_this_secret.translation: Nāu i hanga tēnei karere huna. Ki te tirohia e koe, kāore e kite te kaiwhiwhi.

web.shared.reply_with_secret.translation: Whakautu ki tētahi atu karere huna

web.shared.pre_reveal_default.en: Click the button below to reveal your secure message.
web.shared.pre_reveal_default.translation: Pāwhiri te pātene ki raro hei whakaatu i tō karere haumaru.

web.shared.post_reveal_default.en: Your secure message is shown below.
web.shared.post_reveal_default.translation: Kei raro nei tō karere haumaru.
